title: Pistachio millefeuille with strawberries and vanilla and mascarpone cream
ingredients: 125g/4½oz double cream, whipped until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed
160g/5½oz butter, chopped, softened, plus extra for greasing
2 egg whites, lightly whisked until frothy
12 fresh strawberries, hulls removed, cut in half
2 x 250g/9oz punnets fresh strawberries, hulls removed, cut in half, to serve
